description: Master Python programming with strong emphasis on Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles.
Become expert in MySQL database management. Learn to create, query, and manage databases effectively.
Start programming journey with C programming. Cover syntax, data types, and basic concepts.
Delve into algorithms. Explore design, analysis, and practical application in problem-solving.
Take C++ to next level. Cover pointers, memory management, and Standard Template Library (STL).

Enhance problem-solving skills with real-world challenges. Learn to tackle complex problems efficiently.

Learn AWS and become proficient in cloud infrastructure management for modern solutions.
